mutants.original_line: s1 = ''.join(char.lower() for char in s1 if char.isalnum())
mutants.mutated_line: s1 = 'MUTATED'.join((char.lower() for char in s1 if char.isalnum()))

mutants.original_line: s2 = ''.join(char.lower() for char in s2 if char.isalnum())
mutants.mutated_line: s2 = 'MUTATED'.join((char.lower() for char in s2 if char.isalnum()))
